scripts.core:watch: concurrently -n tsc,gulp,common "cd packages/core && yarn tsc:watch" "cd packages/core && yarn gulp:watch" "cd packages/common && yarn watch"
scripts.docs:watch: concurrently -n docgen,hugo,webpack -c green,blue,cyan "cd docs && hugo server" "cd docs && yarn webpack -w"
scripts.docs:build: cd docs && yarn webpack --prod && node build.js && hugo
scripts.docs:deploy: cd docs && yarn && cd .. && yarn docs:build
scripts.publish:packages: yarn build && lerna publish --exact -m "chore: Publish %s release" --no-git-tag-version
